CatDescriptText: Image published in advertisement in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 13, 1952, pg. 20, with text:  We Cordially Invite Our Many Friends To Visit Our Beautifully Remodeled Funeral Home.  Exterior view of Crunkleton Funeral home with the' New Look.'  Modern in Design...The Latest in Furnishing.  Completely equipped to serve our clientele in the hour of need.  Open house - Sunday, Sept. 14, 1952... 1108 Liverpool Street, North Side."
TitMainTitle: Crunkleton Funeral Home with three dark awnings with light colored trim, and brick church with arched stained glass windows on right, 1108 Liverpool Street, Northside
